TopicTitle: "How do I make a moving payload bay?" and other things concerning my Skylon mod.

Articles.Content:
I have a few issues with my Skylon mod pack's payload bay that's missing from itself. It's not there, it's not there, and it's not there.

Also, it's not there.

But there are issues with the hypothetical part in the hypothetical world of my Unity project T+ </= 1 day from now.

How do I get a mesh collider working? Anyone have some collider meshes that I can use for it?

How do I make the animation work in Unity?

How do I make the animation work in-game?

If you take the time to answer, thanks.

any help would be appreciated.

How do I get a simple landing gear working? I've seen the heiarchies of the stock gear, and it is (NOT.) pretty.

Here's my Skylon [spaceplane] mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66460-WIP-Modular-Skylon-spaceplane-system%21-Now-with-SABRE-Engine%21?p=914923#post914923

Thanks for reading.

Cheers, good day(s), etc.,,

Naten
